name: 4Ever Kohomba Kaha Face Wash
description: Enriched with neem and turmeric extracts, minerals and vitamins, this gentle face wash thoroughly cleanses and purifies while preserving the moisture of the skin. Formulated to skin pH of 5.5 – 6.0, this face wash, nourishes, whitens and helps to lighten and make more fresh and taut. Good for normal to dry skin. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
